item.title: Gem
item.description: What I Used Finally finished setting up my Website and Gemini Capsule. I thought I should document what i used to create it Converting from GMI to HTML I wanted to ensure that my site wasn’t only limited to gemini, but I really didn’t want to write HTML for everything. I was originally going to try to regex it all out, as I noticed HexDSL and Uoou doing, but this was cumbersome and i couldn’t be bothered.
